sell_coins_input: Put in the Wyak id yuo want to transfer:
sell_coins_note1: 1. Don't transfer at a price lower than 1 US dollar = 8000 gold coins.When it happen,you may lost your identity as a merchant
sell_coins_note2: 2. For recharge currency, please contact whatsapp 86 13570493305 and provide your Wyak id
sell_coins_note3: 3. If the number of gold coins in the account is less than 50000, the coin merchant logo will not be displayed, please recharge in time
sell_coins_not_same_region: The user is not in your region
sell_coins_too_frequent: The operation is too frequent, please try again later
sell_coins_insufficient_balance: The number is more than your gold coin balance
sell_vips_input: Put in the Wyak id yuo want to sell:
sell_vips_purchase_min_money_desc: A minimum of $300 for a single purchase
merchant_area_list_empty: There are no currency dealers in the selected area
merchat_fill_whatsapp_tip: Please fill in your WhatsApp so that buyers can contact you.
merchant_warning_low_sell: You have been reported and confirmed to have repeatedly sold coins at a high price (more than $1 = 8300). If you do so again, you will be forced to cancel your status as a coin dealer
merchant_cancel_days: You have been reported and confirmed to have repeatedly sold coins at a high price (more than $1 = 8300). You have been suspended from working as a currency dealer for 15 days
merchant_cancel_forever: You have been reported and confirmed to have repeatedly sold coins at a high price (more than $1 = 8300). You have been punished and permanently suspended from working as a currency dealer
merchant_no_a_merchant: This user is not a Merchant
merchant_confirm_report: Are you sure you want to report him?
